channel.title: Security Cheatsheets on realspaceeagle
channel.description: Recent content in Security Cheatsheets on realspaceeagle

item.title: CORS Cheatsheet
item.description: Typical CORS misconfigurations, exploitation paths, and secure configuration patterns.

item.title: Linux Privilege Escalation Cheatsheet
item.description: Comprehensive guide for Linux privilege escalation techniques, including doas, sudo misconfigurations, SUID/SGID abuse, and more

item.title: Nginx Configuration Analysis Cheatsheet
item.description: Guide for analyzing nginx configurations during penetration testing, including virtual hosts, proxy configurations, and security misconfigurations

item.title: Nmap Cheatsheet - Complete Port Scanning Reference
item.description: Comprehensive Nmap cheatsheet covering port scanning, network discovery, service enumeration, and advanced scanning techniques for penetration testing

item.title: Reverse Shell Cheatsheet
item.description: Comprehensive collection of reverse shell commands, payloads, and techniques for various platforms and languages

item.title: SQL Injection Cheatsheet
item.description: Payload patterns, testing workflow, and remediation guidance for SQL injection vulnerabilities.

item.title: Web Directory Enumeration Cheatsheet
item.description: Comprehensive guide for web directory and file enumeration using gobuster, feroxbuster, and other tools

item.title: WebSocket SQL Injection Cheatsheet
item.description: Specialized techniques for testing and exploiting SQL injection vulnerabilities in WebSocket connections
